Name: $15 Off Game Play LV
Description:
Enjoy $15 Off Game Play at Topgolf Las Vegas!

Welcome to Topgolf Las Vegas, the premier entertainment destination in Las Vegas, NV. Enjoy year-round comfort in our hitting bays with cooling fans in the summer and heated bays in the winter, all with HDTVs in every bay and throughout our sports bar and restaurant. Using our complimentary clubs or your own, take aim at the giant outfield targets and our high-tech balls will score themselves.

Name: $15 Off Game Play Topgolf
Description:
Enjoy $15 Off Game Play at any Topgolf location! Come Play Around!

Topgolf is 100% golf with clubs, balls, tees, turf, and a ball-picker-upper-cart thing. 

Topgolf is also 100% not golf, too, with loud music, giant targets, giant TVs, and hand-crafted food and drinks.
